modName: Skyrim Better Performance D3D9 For ATI Cards Only REUPLOAD
summary: This is a reupload of the D3D9.dll patch for skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS ONLY THE FILE FOR ATI USERS. I WILL UPLOAD THE NVIDIA ONE AS SOON AS I FIND IT.

I do not fully understand what this does \'under the hood\' as I am only re-uploading this file. Basically when you drop this file into the skyrim installation folder it can give you up to a 20fps boost.

Just drag and drop the file into the skyrim installation directory for it to work. 

Do not slay me as I am not the original creator of this file. I take no credit what so ever.
author: Unknown
